# [Interview #476: TGS Signing Report - Robert Moreau, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=476#11)

#### Question

If the Forsaken were in a bubble all by themselves, who would win?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Ishamael. He's got the True Power.
